The spread of COVID-19 isn’t a Republican problem or Democrat problem this is an American problem!   This is NOT the time for politics Speaker Pelosi. https://t.co/3NXM3UFVUT

❗️ ATTENTION ❗️  Out of caution due to the spread of the Coronavirus COVID-19 and the increased likelihood that Congress will be in session next week we will be rescheduling the upcoming event with Congressman Devin Nunes in Idaho Falls on Tuesday March 17 2020.
